subject: Re: [junit] How do i check if i am getting right output
msgSnippet: ... Or the results of System.getProperty( line.seperator ) Certain output streams automatically convert n to the line seperator of the platform you are on. --
messageBody:
On 9/21/05, Elliotte Harold <elharo@...> wrote:
> newtojunit wrote:
>
> > when i run junit it gives me a error. however the output is as expected.
> >
> > Wht am i doing wrong
>
> Wild guess: use \r\n instead of \n.

Or the results of System.getProperty("line.seperator")

Certain output streams automatically convert \n to the line seperator
of the platform you are on.

--
"Software is too expensive to build cheaply"
Robert Watkins http://twasink.net/ robertdw@...
